synopsis.text: Because of the captivating allure of a local flower shop owner named Rokka Shimao, Ryousuke Hazuki finds himself frequenting her store daily, hoping to catch a glimpse of the beautiful widow. To increase his chances of winning her heart, Hazuki takes on a part-time job at the shop, only to encounter an unexpected obstacle: the ghost of Rokka's late husband, Atsushi Shimao. The deceased husband, who has been secretly watching over Rokka since his passing three years ago, is the only one visible to Hazuki. As the ghost attempts to sabotage Hazuki's advances and possess his body, a bizarre love triangle unfolds between a heartbroken woman, a lingering spirit, and a determined suitor, each unwilling to let go of their desires. Will Hazuki's love for Rokka blossom, or will the ghostly presence of her late husband forever keep them apart?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
